title: Cosmic Ordering: Chakra Clearing
description: Restart, rebalance and recharge your energy centres (chakras) from head to toe. Power up these dynamos and see the difference this makes to your "Cosmic Ordering". Energize yourself and restart the energy flow effortlessly when you experience the power within the audio-CD, booklet and oracle cards specifically designed for followers of Cosmic Ordering. Chakra clearing is the essential key to successful ordering and vital in your life's journey of accomplishments.
author: Stephen Richards
